transcript:
Namaskar, Mohan ko call karne ke liye dhanyavad.
Hello
Hello
Sir very good evening Pravesh Sharma baat kar raha tha India Mart office Noida se.
Ji ji sir.
Ji ji kaise hain sir aap?
Ji badhiya sir aap bataiye. Sir mafi chahunga us din na sir actually main Himachal aaya hua tha to us vajah se aapka call miss kar gaya main. Main working mein nahi tha really sorry. Sir maine na abhi data nikala aapka calls ka right sir. To 9 tarikh ko do agree ek call mujhe dikh rahi hai jo missed mein hai but mere data mein wo fetch nahi ho rahi hai.
Ab sir dekhiye isme na do scenario hai maine aapka last ek mahine ka data nikala to aapka na 80 to 85% call answer hua hai. Right sir. Humne na sir isme sare corrections major jo required hote hain ki calls ka jo hamara system hai properly function kare wo sari cheeze maine karai. Main sir aapko ye recommend karunga hum aapka number change kar dete hain.
Nahi to wo number change karne se kaise solve ho jayega?
Sir actually kya hai na ki abhi jo hamari new series aayi hai to usme shayad ye problem na ho agar aap keh rahe hain kyuki dekhiye abhi 85% tak to aapka answer ho gaya. Se matlab shayad se kya sir isme do teen mahina se shayad shayad se hi kam chal raha hai ki ye kar dete hain aise ho jayega. True caller hata lo ye kar lo.
Sir wo cheez main nahi keh raha hu sir dekhiye maine kuch cases mein aisa karwaya to wo theek hua hai. Isi vajah se to sir main aapko main recommend kar raha hu sir dekhiye haan ji. Ji ji. Hello. Main ye keh raha hu sir kuch cases mein maine karwaya ye ye work kara hai but main ab ab sir dekhiye main unko bhi nahi bol sakta dekhiye kuch to hai hai to sir ye technology. Aapko bhi pata hai sir bade bade bank ke server bhi down ho jate hain. Kuch na kuch agar main mere ko to still ye lag raha hai 85% call aapne uthaya hai to ek do call ho sakta hai aap se miss ho ek do call system ki vajah se bhi aisa aa raha ho. Nahi main wo sir sir sir agar 10 miss call ho rahe hain na usme do miss call aise hote hain jo mere se hua ho. Aath miss call yani ki 80% jo hai system ke karan miss call ho raha hai.
Thik hai. Ab sir aap mujhe bataiye sir dekhiye main to aapki company ke liye kam kar raha hu sir main to bilkul galat nahi jaunga aapki profile leke kisi cheez ke liye. Maine sir ek ek functioning yaha pe check karwai hai. Ab aap aap khud dekhiye maine aapko chart bhi bheja aapka 100% answering ratio aa raha hai waha pe. Mere app mein to wo dikh raha hai missed call. Main wahi keh raha hu aapke app mein dikh raha hai bilkul dikh raha hai isiliye to maine aapko dala wo chart bhi. Maine waha unko dala hai to wo ye keh rahe hain ki system mein glitch might be ho ya na ho kyuki 85% agar aap utha rahe hain 10 12% mein aisa issue aa raha hai answering calls mein to sir aapka ratio achcha hai. To main aapko ye recommend kar raha hu sir apni taraf se. Isme aapko koi aisa koi problem aayega nahi main aapko batau. Isme koi problem aapka 90% scenario mein sir aap jab kisi buyer se baat karte hain aap uska number whatsapp pe sabse pehle save karte honge aap. Right sir. Aisa to hai nahi aap PNS number buyer save karta hoga aap unse baat karte honge. To main ek aapki tasalli ke liye kyuki ye cheeze kafi jagah work kari hai sir is vajah se main aap se keh raha hu. Warna aap mujhe bataiye sir dekhiye maine team se aaj bhi sara settings pura morning mein unko dala aate hi unhone check kara ki sari functioning jaise new customer ka onboard karte hain jaise PNS settings hoti hai wo sari unhone dobara se reset kari hai aapke number. Aaj ka main subah se dekh raha tha abhi to koi miss call aaya nahi hai subah se abhi tak. To ab aap mujhe bataiye sir main isme kya kar sakta hu is tarah se. Aapke aapke sir aapke help hoga. Sir mere aapka thoda voice kat raha hai sir. Aap please ye dekh ke bata sir paanch din pehle ka mera response rate kya tha?
Kitne din pehle ka sir?
Paanch din pehle ka mera response rate overall jo profile ko dikhta hai wo kitna tha? Sir abhi aapka 76% dikh raha hai paanch din pehle ka mujhe nahi dikh payega sir. Aath 10 din pehle sir 80 83 85 ke aas paas tha agar sorry sorry 81% hi response rate hai. 81% tha paanch din pehle 83 ya 85 tha to jab miss call hue nahi to ye kaise ho gaye?
Sir main to keh hi raha hu sir mujhe system mein dikh rahi hai miss call might bhi ho sakta hai 10 second ke andar ki ho to hamara system usko na le raha ho. 10 second sir agar nahi na le raha ho aapka system to fir ye response rate mein kyu kam ho gaya? Sir main main normally isme bata raha hu nahi ab aapne bola 83 tha maine nahi dekha tha 83 hai main ek bar team ko dalta hu main something tha haan. Agar aap keh rahe hain sir hoga aap agar itna surely check kar rahe hain to bilkul hoga aap. Sir matlab main aur kuch bhi kam agar phone mere paas mein ho. Ji ispe sabse pehle dhyan rehta hai. Bilkul rehta hai bilkul rehta hai. Main main aapko batau sir 100% call picking up ratio to kisi customer ka nahi hai India Mart pe hardly koi ek do nahi hoga 90 ke kareeb hoga. Wahi wahi main bhi to hamare mistake ke alava jo miss ho rahe hain uske karan ye kam ho raha hai na sir mera? Bilkul bilkul. Hmm. To sir isiliye maine aapko recommend kara sir agar aap bole isse ho sakta hai solve. Sir aise hi recommend nahi kariye na usme kya kya technical issue aa rahi hai is number ke sath wo aap bataiye abhi agar actually mein aisa hota hai to bhi kariye aap nahi mujhe profile ki visibility pe farak na aati ho. Main samajh gaya main samajh gaya Mohan sir agar technical issue hota to aapka 70% 80% call missed out ho raha hota aaj normal calls mein bhi na sir aap call mein laiye aapko din mein 15 20 call mein ek call kya hota hai kisi aur ke sath connected ho jata hai ya call dial hi hota hai call failed ho jata hai. Normal main aapko dikha sakta hu sir mere Jio number se main aapko din mein ek bar call failed ho jata hai mera baat karte karte. Wo disconnect ho jata hai aapki aapki baat sahi hai. To failed hota hai to wahi main aapko starting day se baat kar raha hu aapko yahi bata raha hu ki aapka system identify nahi kar pa raha hai ki ye mere karan fail hua hai ki buyer ke karan fail hua hai ya network connectivity ke karan fail hua hai. To ye aap identify karke wo mark karenge na ki mere mistake ke karan jo fail hua ho. Mohan sir aap response rate mein calculate kariye otherwise mat consider kariye. Mohan sir Jio network ka hum kaise track kar payenge kyuki hum to bas usko forward kar rahe hain sir. Ye sara to switching to ho sakta hai network provider ke sath. Aap forward kar aap forward kar rahe ho to mere pe forwarded call aayi ki nahi aayi ye to aapko pata chalta hoga. Nahi pata chalta aap khud bataiye sir forwarding hai sirf ye forwarding ka ek tool hai ek software kind of hai jo sari calls ko root out kar deta hai. Jaise humne aap apne number ki call kisi number pe forward karenge ye problem solve nahi hoga hai na? Sir problem main isiliye to sir aapko ab sir agar aapka 80 80% ho raha tha main keh raha tha fir bhi main ek bar Vipul se baat kar leta hu isme hum kya solution de ek do call ke liye sir main unse bhi aakhiri mein maine baat ki unhone bola ek bar hum number change karke dekh lete hain. Unhone yahi bola ki agar itna jyada agar aap track kar rahe hain ki aapko matlab mahine mein do teen call kitna call aa raha hai mahine mein aisa sir jo aap keh rahe hain ki matlab total missed mein aap keh rahe hain 80% ka call ring hi nahi karta na sir ye aap keh rahe hain. Matlab agar 10 10 miss ho rahe hain usme 80% aaya hi nahi hai hamare paas. Iska track abhi maine aapko bheja data sir sir maine aapko data bheja hai 7 November se starting thik hai sorry 6 November se aap gin lo kitna call hai. Kal tak ka isme wo to aa hi nahi raha na sir matlab India Mart wala number ka to naam hi nahi aa raha jo aapne mujhe screenshot diya hai na sir. Aapne jo screenshot mujhe diya usme India Mart buyer wala to aa hi nahi raha na matlab wo dikh hi nahi raha aapke. Ji aap meri baat nahi samjhe wo to Friday ko maine bheja tha screenshot aapko. Ji haan isme wo aaya hi nahi hai to show kaise hoga? Wahi to main keh raha hu. To matlab maine to ye do sample jo call thi ek jo aapne mujhe bheji usme nahi dikh rahi hai maine wo waha pe aage dala hai unhone yahi bola hai ki yaha pe to call dikh raha hai ki connect hua ab aapka operator matlab aap samjhiye sir main jab call forward karunga to wo Airtel hi aage forward karne wala hai. Agar aapka maximum fall ho raha hota na sir to main to khud hi se change karata sir mere customer ko problem ho rahi hai to mujhe problem hai. Main to clear aap se ek cheez bolunga sir main to kam hi aapki company ke liye kar raha hu still main unse ek bar baat kar leta hu sir main aapko final bata deta hu isme kya hai hoga nahi hoga isme kya ho sakta hai aise scenario mein. Main pura clear bataiye nahi hoga to fir main chodunga kyu pakad ke rakhunga is cheez ko. Main main ek bar main ek bar kya track karta rahu. Nahi nahi main hi track karunga aapko jarurat nahi hai par main baat karta hu unse.
summary:
Concerns:

- Missed calls not reflecting accurately in app.

- Response rate decreased despite no missed calls.

- System unable to identify cause of call failure.



Resolution:

- Executive suggested changing the customer's number.

- Executive checked functioning and PNS settings.

- Executive will discuss with Vipul for a solution.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will call back with a final update.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- missed calls, response rate, system issue, number change
